name: Seven // Seven
description:
Project: Seven // Seven is a game that I made for a school project but never released, I thought that I may aswell put it out to the public.

Features:

  • Fully fledged out weapon and mods system, combine unique mods to create awesome builds!
  • Procedurally generated worlds.
  • Player upgrades.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Unique, semi 3D graphics with a cyberpunk hacking game feel.

Controls:

  • Left mouse: move
  • Right mouse: shoot
  • G/H - pick up weapon
  • Tab - swap weapon
Linux and Mac versions are untested and may require giving execution perms!
Example on Mac: chmod -R 755 /Path/to/BuildMac.app
